title: Apple Watch Series 8 Review!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey, guys. It's Justine. And today we are checking out the brand new Apple Watch Series 8. I am so excited about this because I have been using the Apple Watch since the first version. And I strongly believe that because I have been wearing an Apple Watch and I know what is normal for my body, that this has actually helped save my life this year. So if you guys haven't seen that video, I did post it on my channel. But long story short, I got a blood clot in my shoulder, and then I ended up getting a pulmonary embolism, which that clot then traveled to my lungs, which could be incredibly dangerous. If you're not familiar with blood clots, I'm actually the World Thrombosis patient advocate this year. And I'm so excited to be able to help spread this information and hopefully save lives because I am active, I'm healthy, I'm... Well, I'm not the youngest that I've ever been, but for me, it was kind of crazy because I never thought that something like this could ever affect me. And when it did, I realized how common it is. And if I could help bring this information to someone, it could potentially save your life. So come join me as we test this out, but first, we have to unbox it. Rewind!
